title: How do I back up and restore contacts?
answer:
Backup 

 On the home screen, touch Tools > Backup. In the upper section of the screen, touch New backup. Select Contacts and touch Back up. 

 If your phone has an external microSD card, the backup data is stored in the Huaweibackup folder in the microSD card's root directory. If your phone has no external microSD card installed, the backup data is stored in the Huaweibackup folder in the root directory of your phone's internal storage. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109609)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109610)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109611)

 Restoration 

 Select a backup file, enter the password, and touch OK. Then select Contacts and touch Restore. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109612) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109613) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109614)
